FuncDef: The reset attack-source-trace command clears information about attack source tracing saved in the memory.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the slot ID.
The value is an integer that ranges from 1 to 31.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
If you run the reset attack-source-trace command, information about attack source tracing saved in the memory is cleared. The save attack-source-trace linktype command saves information about attack source tracing saved in memory as a file.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
